patterns.description: Generate user stories and acceptance criteria for agile development tasks following standard agile methodology formats.
Interpret questions deeply and provide concise, insightful answers in brief markdown bullets focused on core concepts.
Evaluate student responses against expert knowledge, providing detailed assessment and feedback adapted to specified academic levels.
Compare political candidates' positions, highlighting key differences in policies, backgrounds, and potential implications of their platforms.
Evaluate conference presentation submissions for content quality, speaker qualifications, and potential audience engagement and educational value.
Analyze user comments to determine sentiment patterns, extract key praise and criticism points, and summarize overall reception.
Analyze email authentication headers (SPF, DKIM, DMARC, ARC) to assess email security and provide actionable recommendations.
Evaluate writing quality and provide structured JSON output rating novelty, clarity, and overall messaging effectiveness.
Analyze writing style using Steven Pinker's principles from 'The Sense of Style' to improve clarity and effectiveness.
Provide expert software development guidance focusing on Java, Spring Framework, and frontend technologies with best practices.
Extract and summarize key philosophical concepts, background, and impactful ideas from notable thinkers and their work.
Review contracts and agreements to identify important stipulations, potential issues, and recommended changes for negotiation.
Format and clean text by fixing line breaks, capitalization, and punctuation while preserving original content and meaning.
Explain coding concepts and languages clearly for beginners using examples from reputable sources and proper syntax formatting.
Create structured comparisons of items in table format, highlighting key differences and similarities across relevant topics.
Convert content to clean markdown format while preserving complete original content, formatting, and structure.
Generate increasingly concise summaries of content in five levels, from five words down to one word.
Analyze AI's impact on job categories, identifying automation risks and providing strategies for career resilience.
Compile relevant, attributed aphorisms from historical figures related to specific topics or themes.
Develop positive mental frameworks for viewing challenging situations, emphasizing constructive perspectives and opportunities.
Design structured coding projects with clear architecture, implementation steps, and best practices using modern technologies.
Generate precise CLI commands for penetration testing tools based on documentation and specific requirements.
Summarize cybersecurity incidents, vulnerabilities, and threats into concise, actionable intelligence briefings.
Create detailed, step-by-step DIY tutorials with clear instructions, required materials, and expected outcomes.
Compose professional email correspondence following business etiquette and maintaining appropriate tone and structure.
Generate clear git commit messages and commands that effectively communicate code changes and updates.
Transform security program metrics into CSV data format for visualizing progress and improvements over time.
Create compelling business offers using Alex Hormozi's '$100M Offers' methodology and principles.
Organize thoughts and concepts using a structured framework analyzing definitions, evidence, relationships, and implications.
Create detailed Graphviz visualizations of investigation data showing relationships, activities, and key findings.
Generate minimalist logo design prompts that capture brand essence through simple, elegant vector graphics.
Transform complex ideas into hierarchical mind maps using Markmap syntax for visual concept representation.
Create GitHub-compatible Mermaid diagrams to visualize workflows, architectures, and processes in documentation.
Write concise, engaging newsletter content in Frontend Weekly style, focusing on key developments and insights.
Generate detailed D&D 5E NPC characters with comprehensive backgrounds, personalities, and game statistics.
Design structured patterns for AI prompts with clear identity, purpose, steps, and output instructions.
Format and structure predictions from content for tracking and verification in markdown-based prediction logs.
Break down complex tasks or ideas into hierarchical, actionable components through recursive decomposition.
Document security assessment findings with clear descriptions, risks, recommendations, and supporting evidence.
Summarize RPG gaming sessions capturing key events, combat encounters, and narrative developments in structured format.
Craft compelling podcast or show introductions that effectively preview content and engage audience interest.
Transform complex concepts into clear, engaging narratives that effectively communicate ideas and implications.
Generate relevant, single-word tags for content categorization and mind mapping organization.
Develop realistic security threat scenarios based on risk analysis and attacker motivation assessment.
Generate time-series data for visualizing critical vulnerability remediation metrics and progress.
Create compelling narratives demonstrating security program improvements in vulnerability remediation efficiency.
Extract world model updates and task algorithms from content to improve decision-making and processes.
Extract and organize video content into timestamped chapters highlighting key topics and moments.
Transform complex concepts into ASCII art visualizations with detailed explanations of represented relationships.
Engage in Socratic dialogue to explore ideas through questioning and critical examination of assumptions.
Analyze a scientific paper to identify its primary findings and assess the quality and rigor of its conclusions.
Generate concise summaries of content by extracting key points, main ideas, and important takeaways into a structured format.
Extract insightful ideas, practical habits, and meaningful recommendations from content, focusing on life wisdom and human flourishing.
Create comprehensive software architecture documentation using the C4 model, including business context, security posture, and detailed system design.
Generate detailed threat models using STRIDE methodology to identify, analyze, and prioritize security threats for system components.
Identify and distill the single most important or insightful idea from content, providing both the core concept and actionable recommendation.
Transform complex concepts and relationships into clear visual diagrams using Mermaid syntax, creating standalone visualizations that effectively convey ideas.
Create precise and structured Product Requirements Documents (PRDs) from input requirements and specifications.
Analyze and explain code, security tool outputs, and configuration files, providing clear explanations of their functionality and implications.
Extract Tactics, Techniques, and Procedures from security publications and translate them into YAML-based Sigma detection rules.
Identify and analyze predictions from content, extracting specific claims, timeframes, confidence levels, and verification criteria.
Write clear, concise technical user stories with descriptions and acceptance criteria for software features and improvements.
Extract and analyze key insights, trends, statistics, and recommendations from cybersecurity threat reports in a structured format.
Analyze malware behavior, extract indicators of compromise, identify MITRE ATT&CK techniques, and provide detection recommendations across multiple platforms.
Extract and prioritize practical recommendations and actionable advice from books, presenting them in a clear, instructive format.
Transform concepts into detailed AI art prompts, incorporating style references and emotional elements to guide visual creation.
Analyze network ports and services to create comprehensive threat reports with risks, trends, and security recommendations.
Transform content into high-quality academic papers using LaTeX formatting with professional layout and authoritative presentation.
Design TED-style presentations with narrative flow, concise slide content, speaker notes, and image descriptions for maximum impact.
Distill the fundamental message from presentations, essays, or bodies of work into a single, clear, impactful sentence.
Design structured, three-phase reading plans with core, extended, and exploratory materials to build comprehensive knowledge of topics.
Identify and extract claims that contradict scientific consensus, are difficult to verify, or conflict with expert understanding.
Generate targeted review questions based on learning objectives, adapting difficulty to specified student levels and subject matter.
Compile concise security newsletters covering current threats, advisories, vulnerabilities, and critical cybersecurity developments with relevant links.
Extract and classify hard and soft skills from job descriptions, organizing them into a structured skill inventory.
Generate ultra-concise content summaries with one-sentence overview, key points, and essential takeaways in minimal words.
Extract powerful insights about life, technology, and human flourishing from content, presenting them as concise, actionable bullet points.
Evaluate truth claims by analyzing supporting evidence, counter-arguments, and logical fallacies to provide balanced, objective assessments.
Analyze debate transcripts to identify key arguments, agreements, misunderstandings, and insights while measuring emotional intensity and participant interaction.
Extract and organize critical information from cybersecurity breach articles, including attack details, impact analysis, and actionable recommendations.
Study interviewer questions and methods to identify effective techniques, patterns, and strategies that lead to exceptional interviews.
Examine historical battles by analyzing strategic decisions, tactical approaches, and pivotal moments to extract key military lessons.
Examine server logs to identify patterns, anomalies, and potential issues, providing insights into system reliability and performance improvements.
Analyze past thinking errors and mistaken beliefs to identify patterns and prevent similar mistakes in current predictions and decisions.
Perform psychological analysis of individuals by examining their language, responses, and behaviors to reveal underlying personality traits and patterns.
Evaluate presentations by scoring content novelty, speaker selflessness, and entertainment value to provide actionable feedback for improvement.
Process and categorize user feedback to identify key themes, consolidate similar inputs, and prioritize actionable insights for product improvements.
Examine ballot propositions to assess their purpose, potential impact, supporting arguments, and implications for stakeholders and regulations.
Evaluate writing quality by rating novelty of ideas, clarity of presentation, and prose style to provide targeted improvement recommendations.
Assess third-party vendor security compliance and privacy standards to determine risk levels and recommend appropriate security controls.
Evaluate sales call performance by analyzing pitch alignment, sales fundamentals, and customer interaction to provide actionable improvement recommendations.
Compare and contrast religious texts with the King James Bible, identifying unique claims, differences in tenets, and doctrinal variations.
Evaluate technology projects' societal impact by analyzing outcomes, ethical considerations, and sustainability across environmental, economic, and social dimensions.
Extract and analyze surprising, insightful, and significant trends from cybersecurity threat reports to identify emerging patterns and developments.
Generate natural, experience-based responses to technical interview questions that demonstrate expertise while maintaining conversational tone and conciseness.
Generate comprehensive security-focused questions to guide secure system design and implementation across different architectural components.
